name: Kiyomi Special Index (Adult Media)
description: Dedicated repository for content containing adult media (XXX, Hentai, JAV, etc.). Providers listed here have explicit adult content.
author: Kiyomi Core Team

providers.name: The Pirate Bay (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General purpose torrent indexer; includes an **Adult (XXX)** category.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Sukebei Nyaa (Adult)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Dedicated adults-only sister site of Nyaa, specializing in 18+ Japanese/Asian media like Hentai and Doujinshi.

providers.name: TokyoTosho
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General Eastern media index which includes **Hentai and JAV** categories.
providers.cautionReason: Non-video content (e.g., games, software, archives) may contain malware.

providers.name: Knaben (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern API providing structured results, including content that may fall under the adult category.
